description:
Five thousand years ago, traditional Chinese medicine shared the profound wisdom and connection between the physical body and the emotional body. If you have heart issues, you could could also suffer from depression and anxiety. If you have depression and anxiety, it could affect your heart. They are interrelated. In this course you will learn how to transform depression and anxiety and blockages in the heart.

This interactive 45-minute course is presented in six segments where you will learn sacred, simple, practical and highly-effective techniques to self heal depression and anxiety. You will also receive extraordinary soul healing blessings from Dr. and Master Sha for healing depression and anxiety.

This course is appropriate for anyone who suffers from occasional to chronic depression and/or anxiety, and for anyone who wishes to prevent depression and anxiety or heart issues, and is appropriate for all age groups. Instructions are given verbally and visually to support your learning.
title: How To Self Heal Depression and Anxiety
